messages.title: Transforming Mental Health Services
messages.content: The Lib Dems will transform mental health services by treating them with the same urgency as physical health.

messages.title: Free Childcare and a Fairer Economy
messages.content: The Lib Dems propose to provide free childcare from 9 months and to help families by unlocking the full potential of our economy.

messages.title: The Choice is Simple
messages.content: The leaflet presents a choice for a brighter future with the Liberal Democrats versus the past with Labour or Conservatives being out of the race.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Transform mental health services by treating them with the same urgency as physical health.
Provide free childcare from 9 months and unlock the full potential of our economy.

issues.health: The Lib Dems promise to transform mental health services by treating them with the same urgency as physical health.

quotes.text: "The Lib Dem fightback is real - and it's changing everything."
"Boris Johnson is on the run from me, he's scared to face any of us."

images.caption: The leaflet shows diverse images of people, including children and families, associating positive emotions with the Liberal Democrats' campaign.
